author: Tim Wallace
title: Gatwick claims Heathrow's expansion could break air quality rules
text: Aviation Gatwick claims Heathrowâ€™s expansion could break air quality rules The south London airport lost out to Heathrow in its bid to expand, but now says it would be the best option to keep air pollution down Heathrow won the backing of the Airports Commission to build a second runway, but Gatwick is fighting back Photo: Getty Images
